entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
